Attacks.Name: Bite
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Pursuit
Attacks.Effect: If the target character moved this turn, this attack gains 2 dice.

Attacks.Name: Taunt
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 3. Until the end of its next activation, that character must target Alolan Rattata with any attacks it makes.

Superpowers.Name: Hustle
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 1 die to its attack rolls but subtracts 1 die from its defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Run Away
Superpowers.Effect: This character may reroll all defense dice when targeted by an attack from a character that is within Range 2.

Attacks.Name: Sucker Punch
Attacks.Effect: If the target character has already activated this turn, this attack gains 2 dice.

Superpowers.Name: Hustle
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 1 die to its attack rolls but subtracts 1 die from its defense rolls.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Alolan's Raticate character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
